name: Galaxy S24 Ultra
display: 6.8 in; 1440x3120 px, QHD+ Dynamic AMOLED 2X with LTPO 4.0
build: Gorilla Glass Armor / Gorilla Glass Victus 2 (curved), titanium frame
phoneFeatures: Guaranteed 7yrs of OS and security updates
Playstation 2 emulations works very well in HD
Galaxy AI (Chat Assist — instant translation, Note Assist, Circle to Search, instant slo-mo, photo editing AI, Live Translate)
cameraFeatures: Shoots everything HDR by default now
Social media apps can use more of the native camera features (OIS, laser autofocus)
Photo editing AI (remaster, background blur, erase reflections, magic editor, Generative Edit) that works even with downloaded photos
cameraPros: The screen is so bright that you probably won't have a problem seeing what you’re shooting
cameraCons: Camera is very much the same as the S23 Ultra
Automatic Macro mode is trash ~ MKBHD, Jan. 2024
There’s a shorter optical zoom range (5x vs last year’s 10x) — but the extra resolution (50 MP vs last year’s 10 MP) makes it more powerful
There’s been a lot of talk amongst consumers about the S24 Ultra camera shots seeming worse than S23 Ultra in camera comparisons
pros: Reduction to screen glare
Higher maximum brightness than S23 Ultra
Most of the Galaxy AI features are not gimmicks
Guaranteed 7yrs of OS updates
Very good haptics ~ Mrwhosetheboss, MKBHD
“In a lot of ways feels smoother to use than my iPhone 15 Pro Max” ~ Mrwhosetheboss, Jan. 2024
“Samsung has gone all in on the little things” (Fluidity, animations, “gorgeous” theming) ~ Mrwhosetheboss, Jan. 2024
cons: Higher price than the S23 Ultra at launch
No longer has curved display (unlike predecessors)
Not all durability problems are saved with the titanium frame
Some of the AI features (probably all the good ones) will only be free until the end of 2025
approbations: “Fastest Samsung I’ve ever used” ~ Mrwhosetheboss, Jan. 2024
“My favorite screen on a phone full stop“ ~ Mrwhosetheboss, Jan. 2024
“One of the best displays that I’ve used” ~ Karl Conrad, Feb. 2024
“Best battery life ever in a Samsung flagship” ~ Mrwhosetheboss, Jan. 2024
“Best screen right now on a smartphone” ~ Karl Conrad, Feb. 2024
“Literally one of the best screens in any phone” ~ MKBHD, Jan. 2024
“Typing has never felt better on any phone” ~ Mrwhosetheboss, Jan. 2024

pros: Higher maximum brightness than S23+
Most of the Galaxy AI features are not gimmicks
Guaranteed 7yrs of OS updates
Feels nicer in hand than the S24 Ultra
Very similar to the S24 Ultra, but cheaper (just smaller battery, no S Pen)
cons: Some of the AI features (probably all the good ones) will only be free until the end of 2025
approbations: “This might just be the best Galaxy device to pick up this year” ~ Booredatwork.com, Jan. 2024

name: Galaxy S23 Ultra
display: 6.8 in; 1440x3088 px, QHD+ Dynamic AMOLED 2X with LTPO 3.0
build: Gorilla Glass Victus 2 (matte, curved), Armor aluminum frame
phoneFeatures: Advanced Vision booster (tweak the color and contrast of display more effective)
cameraFeatures: Optical zoom up to 10x, 100x Space Zoom
Super HDR functionality on front camera
cameraPros: The highest camera resolution on a phone
pros: Made with 22% recycled glass
Guaranteed 4yrs of OS and security updates
cons: None recorded
approbations: Tied for Best Flagship of 2023 (with iPhone 15 Pro Max) ~ Mrwhosetheboss, Nov. 2023

name: Galaxy S23+
build: Gorilla Glass Victus 2, Armor aluminum frame (glossy)
phoneFeatures: Advanced Vision booster (tweak the color and contrast of display more effective)
cameraFeatures: Optical Zoom at 3x, Digital Zoom up to 30x
Super HDR functionality on front camera
cameraCons: Same exact rear cameras as the Galaxy S22+
pros: Slightly larger battery than last year’s Galaxy S22+
Guaranteed 4yrs of OS and security updates
cons: None recorded

name: Galaxy S23
build: Gorilla Glass Victus 2, Armor aluminum frame (glossy)
phoneFeatures: Advanced Vision booster (tweak the color and contrast of display more effective)
cameraFeatures: Optical Zoom at 3x, Digital Zoom up to 30x

cameraCons: Exact same rear cameras as the Galaxy S22

name: Galaxy S23 FE
cameraCons: Pictures aren’t at a flagship level (but it’s not a flagship phone)
Quality of telephoto camera isn’t that great
“Selfie cam is less than stellar” ~ Tech Spurt, Dec. 2023
pros: 100% recycled aluminum frame
Maximum brightness is brighter than the S23
Guaranteed 4yrs of OS updates and 5yrs of security updates
It feels just as fast as the flagship S23 models ~ Mark Spurrell, Nov. 2023
When you actually use this phone for a little while, you realize what you thought was a negative is actually just fine” ~ Mark Spurrell, Nov. 2023
cons: No LTPO display
A bit of a large chin
Large bezels (even larger than the S21 FE)
Fingerprint sensor is not ultrasonic (unlike flagship S23 models)
“Samsung failed to make the S23 FE a phone that their tech fans would want” ~ Mark Spurrell, Nov. 2023

name: Galaxy S22 Ultra
display: 6.8 in; 1440x3088 px, curved QHD+ Dynamic AMOLED 2X
phoneFeatures: Boxier design like a Galaxy Note
S Pen has much lower latency than past S Pens (2.8)
cameraFeatures: 12-bit HDR recording (64x more colors then previously)
cameraPros: "Surprisingly big improvement considering how the hardware looks" ~ Mrwhosetheboss
cameraCons: Same rear camera sensor as Galaxy S21 Ultra
pros: Guaranteed 4yrs of OS and security updates
Faster charging than predecessors
cons: Camera protudes
Camera bumps collect a lot of dust
approbations: "Best Big Phone of the year" ~ MKBHD, Dec. 2022

name: Galaxy S21 Ultra
display: 6.8 in; 1440x3200 px, curved WQHD+ Dynamic AMOLED 2x
cameraFeatures: Dual Pixel autofocus in ultrawide (macro camera)
cameraPros: Fixed focus problems from S20 Ultra
cameraCons: No OIS on ultrawide camera
pros: $200 cheaper than S20 Ultra was
Pre-order comes with free Galaxy Buds Pro
Exynos & Snapdragon chip disparity is fixed
25% more nits of brightness than predecessors (and brighter than the S21 & S21+)
Has 120Hz w/ Quad HD resolution (unlike S20 models)
Ultrasonic fingerprint sensor faster and larger than predecessors
cons: No charger ITB (unlike predecessors)
No SD card support (unlike predecessors)
No AKG earbuds ITB (unlike predecessors)
Camera protrudes even more than S20 Ultra
No MST for Samsung Pay anymore
Samsung only updates phone for 3 years
Snapdragon chip camera is a bit better than Exynos variants
approbations: “Best screen on any phone” ~ The Tech Chap
“Best phone in the world right now” ~ The Tech Chap
“Best Android phone right now” ~ ASBYT, Feb 2021
“Best display on the market” ~ ASBYT, Feb 2021
“Best camera on any phone right now; most versatility & quality” ~ The Tech Chap

name: Galaxy S20 Ultra

phoneFeatures: Battery health - moniters battery to see when time for replacement

Even smaller hole punch than the Note 10 models
Fast charging (power adapter) comes ITB
AKG earbuds come ITB
cons: 120Hz only for FHD not 2K
Fingerprint sensor is a bit picky

name: Galaxy S20 FE
pros: No Bixby button
Comes with pre-installed screen protector
cons: Fingerprint sensor is not ultrasonic (it's optical, unlike the flagship S20s)
In UK, India, and some other countries, it comes with the Exynos 990 chips rather than the Snapdragon, and as a result, has worse performance than the USA Snapdragon variant

name: Galaxy S10+
pros: Has headphone jack (unlike later Samsung S models)
Audio is better than Galaxy S9 models - louder and crispier
World's first displays to support HDR10+ (all S10s)
World's first phones to run Wi-Fi 6 (S10, S10+)
You can hide the punch out pill in settings
40% less blue light than predecessors
Bixby button can be remapped to any app
Comes with a screen protector pre-installed
International edition comes with clear case ITB
Fast charging (power adapter) comes ITB
AKG earbuds come ITB
cons: Large punch out pill
No Iris ID (unlike predecessors)
Reverse wireless charging is slow
No LED notifications (unlike predecessors)
Power button is an inconvenient spot (a bit high)
